title: AHS Apocalypse Episode 2 Featured Every Season
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: ''He dominated the entire scene. Literally.'' I see what you did there. 😉

I have a theory, and it's that since Apocalypse is in October of 2021, the ghosts of Murder house, is able to leave the house in Halloween, so when Halloween hits, some of the Murder House ghosts will head to the Outpost 3.
I thought Michael Langdon's interview with Mr. Gallant was very reminiscent of Kai's interviews in Cult
Mary this is excellent! I definitely got SCUM vibes from Veneble this episode, but didn’t catch most of the other connections, these are my favorite!
DEFINITELY got Misty vibes from the snakes coming back to life! I can't waiitttttt for the next episode!
